title: [1.7/1.8]超现实主义材质包 64x
author: 夜頥瑿
txt_content:
本帖最后由 夜頥瑿 于 2017-1-7 15:11 编辑 

WorldsEnd Surrealism超现实末日主义

作者原文This is a pack I started creating for a mod pack I am creating called "WorldsEnd Mod Pack" curently still in the works as I am creating all the mods for the mod pack.What I tryed to bring with this pack is a surrealism feel where things are real and comical, with bright colors and lots of skins for mobs and creatures.I was a tattoo artist for years and I have always loved the bright colors and hard lines in surreal art, I will be adding more of this feel over time to this pack.When I first started creating this pack I was going to be doing it in 64x 128x 256x and 512, but as I am the only person doing this I am only doing this as a 256x pack. I will be making a 64bit one but it will be different as it is to hard to have realism in 64x 64x so it will be a toon pack, called, "ToonIt", but I wont be adding that tillI am done with the ModPack.Install:1)
Just add .zip to your Minecraft Resource Packs Folder ALSO:If you do not use MCPatcher or Optifine you will not see all the content from this pack.Optifine, in addition to making most peoples' Minecraft run faster, also adds a whole slew of ingame visual settings!
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/249637-Optifine---Credits---Used stuff from Sphax PureBDcraft , Affinity-HD, KoP Photo Realism and VonDoomCraft HD, all credits go to them for their amazing images I just used them to create the feel that I had in mind with this Resource Pack. Most images have been edited and changed to fit the feel for the mod pack I am creating around this Resource Pack, call "WorldsEnd Mod Pack". 
There are a lot of images I created like the stone, cobblestone and flowers.Sphax PureBDcraft:
http://bdcraft.net/purebdcraft-minecraftAffinity-HD:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... ty-hd-resource-packVonDoomCraft HD:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... 0-updates-and-stuffKoP Photo Realism:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... 8-kop-photo-realism---Copy Rights---Anyone can use this texturepack for any thing they would like but keep in mind that you need to give credit to all the above Packs as stated in their copy right stuff on their posts/pages.I will be updating this all the time.Thanks hope you all like, this pack took 2 weeks of all day every day work to get it feeling right.

原文大致翻译我试着使这个材质包带有超现实主义的感觉当我第一次开始制作这个材质包时，我想将其分为64x 128x 256x以及512x，但因为整个制作过程都只有我一个人因此放弃了，我打算只制作一个64x的,但这很困难,因为它在64x64的材质下很难产生现实感，作者目前仍打算更新此材质包(请原谅楼主英语不好，只能翻译出一小部分)
图片欣赏




下载地址原贴下载：https://mods.curse.com/texture-packs/minecraft/224078-worldsend-surrealism-resource-pack备用百度云：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1miqaWMO [1.7版本]                  http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eSBRT6a  [1.8版本]



作者原文给予了转载以及使用权利原作者：PCgaming247
新人第一次搬运，不嫌弃的话就回复一下吧 :)
